fields.name: idle
fields.explanation: vocalizations generated at intervals when nothing else is happening.

fields.name: idle noncombat
fields.comment: played randomly and intermittently whenever we aren't in combat

fields.name: idle combat
fields.comment: played randomly and intermittently whenever we're in combat

fields.name: idle flee
fields.comment: played continuously while we are fleeing

fields.name: involuntary
fields.explanation: vocalizations generated automatically when damaged; interrupt everything except scripted dialogue.

fields.name: pain body minor
fields.comment: took body damage

fields.name: pain body major
fields.comment: took a significant amount of body damage

fields.name: pain shield
fields.comment: took shield damage

fields.name: pain falling
fields.comment: took damage from falling

fields.name: scream fear
fields.comment: screaming in fear (falling to your death, explosive stuck to you)

fields.name: scream pain
fields.comment: screaming in pain (being flamed)

fields.name: maimed limb
fields.comment: limb body part (arm or leg) was destroyed

fields.name: maimed head
fields.comment: head body part was destroyed

fields.name: death quiet
fields.comment: died from minor damage, or was unprepared

fields.name: death violent
fields.comment: died from violent trauma

fields.name: death falling
fields.comment: died from falling

fields.name: death agonizing
fields.comment: died in a horribly painful fashion (burnt to death)

fields.name: death instant
fields.comment: died instantly

fields.name: death flying
fields.comment: died and was blown up into the air

fields.name: killing spree
fields.comment: we are on a killing spree

fields.name: player kill responses
fields.explanation: responses to a friendly player killing an enemy nearby

fields.comment: response to the player killing an enemy

fields.name: player kill bullet cm
fields.comment: response to the player killing an enemy with bullets

fields.name: friend died
fields.comment: a friendly AI died

fields.name: friend player died
fields.comment: a friendly player died

fields.name: friend killed by friend
fields.comment: a friend died from friendly fire

fields.name: friend killed by friendly player
fields.comment: friend died from player's friendly fire

fields.name: friend killed by enemy
fields.comment: a friend died from enemy fire

fields.name: friend killed by enemy player
fields.comment: friend died from an enemy player

fields.name: friend killed by covenant
fields.comment: a friend died from covenant fire

fields.name: friend killed by flood
fields.comment: a friend died from the flood

fields.name: friend killed by sentinel
fields.comment: a friend died from sentinel fire

fields.name: friend betrayed
fields.comment: a friend was deliberately killed by an ally that we don't trust (e.g. player killed a marine)

fields.name: shouting
fields.explanation: vocalizations that can be played even if a friend is talking

fields.name: new combat alone
fields.comment: see an enemy and we have not previously been in combat

fields.name: new enemy recent combat
fields.comment: see a new enemy and we have recently been in combat

fields.name: old enemy sighted
fields.comment: see an enemy that we are currently looking for

fields.name: unexpected enemy
fields.comment: unexpectedly encounters enemy (behind or to the side)

fields.name: dead friend found
fields.comment: unexpectedly finds a dead body of a friend

fields.name: alliance broken
fields.comment: we decide that a former ally is now a traitor

fields.name: alliance reformed
fields.comment: we forgive a traitor and make him our friend again

fields.name: grenade throwing
fields.comment: throwing a grenade

fields.name: grenade sighted
fields.comment: see an enemy grenade

fields.name: grenade startle
fields.comment: alerted by a grenade bouncing near us

fields.name: grenade danger enemy
fields.comment: in danger from an enemy grenade

fields.name: grenade danger self
fields.comment: in danger from your own grenade

fields.name: grenade danger friend
fields.comment: in danger from a friendly grenade (not our own)

fields.name: new combat group re
fields.comment: reply to a nearby friend who alerted us to an enemy

fields.name: new combat nearby re
fields.comment: reply to a distant friend who alerted us to an enemy

fields.name: alert friend
fields.comment: alert a friend who is in a noncombat state

fields.name: alert friend re
fields.comment: alerted by a friend when in a noncombat state

fields.name: alert lost contact
fields.comment: alert friends that target was not at expected location

fields.name: alert lost contact re
fields.comment: alert friends that target was not at expected location

fields.name: blocked
fields.comment: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

fields.name: blocked re
fields.comment: friend is blocking us from moving or firing

fields.name: search start
fields.comment: starting to search

fields.name: search query
fields.comment: asking searchers whether they have found anything

fields.name: search query re
fields.comment: asking searchers whether they have found anything

fields.name: search report
fields.comment: searcher reporting that an area is clear

fields.name: search abandon
fields.comment: searcher giving up on search

fields.name: search group abandon
fields.comment: search coordinator giving up on search

fields.name: group uncover
fields.comment: starting to uncover target with friend

fields.name: group uncover re
fields.comment: starting to uncover target

fields.name: advance
fields.comment: our platoon starts to attack or advance

fields.name: advance re
fields.comment: our platoon starts to attack or advance

fields.name: retreat
fields.comment: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

fields.name: retreat re
fields.comment: our platoon starts to defend or retreat

fields.name: cover
fields.comment: telling friends to seek cover

fields.name: sighted friend player
fields.comment: sighted a new friendly player

fields.name: shooting
fields.comment: shooting at an enemy

fields.name: shooting vehicle
fields.comment: shooting from a vehicle at an enemy

fields.name: shooting berserk
fields.comment: shooting at an enemy while berserk

fields.name: shooting group
fields.comment: shooting at a group of enemies

fields.name: shooting traitor
fields.comment: shooting at a traitorous player

fields.name: taunt
fields.comment: taunting the enemy

fields.name: taunt re
fields.comment: taunted by an enemy

fields.name: flee
fields.comment: fleeing in panic

fields.name: flee re
fields.comment: fleeing in panic

fields.name: flee leader died
fields.comment: fleeing in panic because our leaders are all dead

fields.name: attempted flee
fields.comment: unable to flee because a leader is nearby

fields.name: attempted flee re
fields.comment: unable to flee because a leader is nearby - response

fields.name: lost contact
fields.comment: target was not at expected location

fields.name: hiding finished
fields.comment: stops hiding and pursues target

fields.name: vehicle entry
fields.comment: enters vehicle

fields.name: vehicle exit
fields.comment: exits vehicle

fields.name: vehicle woohoo
fields.comment: excited while in vehicle (big air, etc)

fields.name: vehicle scared
fields.comment: scared while in vehicle (imminent crash)

fields.name: vehicle collision
fields.comment: riding in a vehicle and the driver collides with something

fields.name: partially sighted
fields.comment: saw something suspicious but not sure it was an enemy

fields.name: nothing there
fields.comment: decided that a suspicious sighting was nothing after all

fields.name: pleading
fields.comment: pleading for the player to spare our pitiable lives

fields.name: surprise
fields.comment: surprised by an enemy, noise, body or weapon impact

fields.name: berserk
fields.comment: went berserk

fields.name: melee attack
fields.comment: attacked an enemy in melee

fields.name: dive
fields.comment: dove away from danger or into cover

fields.name: uncover exclamation
fields.comment: leapt out of corner to uncover a suspected target

fields.name: leap attack
fields.comment: begin a leap attack

fields.name: resurrection
fields.comment: arise and return to life

fields.name: celebration
fields.comment: all enemies defeated

fields.name: check body enemy
fields.comment: post-combat checking an enemy's dead body

fields.name: check body friend
fields.comment: post-combat checking a friend's dead body

fields.name: shooting dead enemy
fields.comment: post-combat shooting an enemy's dead body

fields.name: shooting dead enemy player
fields.comment: post-combat shooting an enemy player's dead body

fields.name: alone
fields.comment: post-combat all friends killed

fields.name: unscathed
fields.comment: post-combat we were not hurt

fields.name: seriously wounded
fields.comment: post-combat we were badly hurt

fields.name: seriously wounded re
fields.comment: post-combat replying to a friend who was badly hurt

fields.name: massacre
fields.comment: post-combat our friends took heavy casualties

fields.name: massacre re
fields.comment: post-combat reply

fields.name: rout
fields.comment: post-combat our friends kicked alien ass

fields.name: rout re
fields.comment: post-combat reply
